abstract.t: 6lowpan applications sometimes need to include application-specificinformation in layer 2 packets that are intended to be processed as6lowpan packets. This document specifies a way to include thisinformation in a 6lowpan packet in such a way that it can be ignoredby implementations that don't care for it.$Id: draft-bormann-6lowpan-ext-hdr.xml,v 1.5 2008/07/02 06:23:58 caboExp $
